comment: the first step of three-step reaction (see R10057, R04501+R05733+R05734)
definition: 4,4-Dimethyl-5alpha-cholest-7-en-3beta-ol + 2 Ferrocytochrome b5 + Oxygen + 2 H+ <=> 4beta-Hydroxymethyl-4alpha-methyl-5alpha-cholest-7-en-3beta-ol + 2 Ferricytochrome b5 + H2O
name: 4,4-dimethyl-5alpha-cholest-7-en-3beta-ol,ferrocytochrome-b5:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
